name: Death March of the Butterflies
description:
The 3 rulers of hell--Lucifer, Azazel, & Astaroth--are its pillars. Destroy one, kill a demonic lord, & the foundation will collapse. 

That is your mission--but all doesn't go according to plan.

__________

Crew

Eliana Zebro (they/them) - Original Concept, Co-Writer (Common Route, Astaroth's Route) Audio & Voice Director, VO Designer, Programmer

Moneesha "Misha" Bakshi (She/They) -  Co-Writer (Lucifer's Route, Azazel's Route)

SaintWrought (They/Them) - Sprite Artist

Ace Luke (She/They) - Sound Designer

Sam MacDonald (he/him) - Composer

Cast

Vyn Vox (He/They) - MC (he/they, trans enby)

Jazzy Oliver (She/They) - Lucifer (she/they, trans enby)

Tarra "Miche" Ward (he/him) - Voice of Azazel (he/him, bigender)

Moneesha "Misha" Bakshi (She/They) -  Astaroth (she/they, enby)
